title: India’s Chief Economic Adviser meets Milinda
body_lines: Government of India Chief Economic Adviser Prof. Anathan Nageswaran, met with High Commissioner Milinda Moragoda at his official residence to discuss the evolving bilateral economic cooperation relationship between the two countries.

Dr. Nageswaran is an internationally recognised economist who after an illustrious career in academia, investment banking, and public policy research was appointed as the 18th Chief Economic Adviser in January.
